description: This file contains Python functions to manage and sort system user and group files such as /etc/passwd, /etc/shadow, and their backups within a root filesystem. It provides mechanisms to sort these files by user/group IDs and clean up backup files.

methods.name: sort_file(filename, mapping)
methods.description: Sorts passwd or group files based on the numeric ID in the third column, optionally applying a mapping for names.

methods.name: remove_backup(filename)
methods.description: Removes backup files associated with system files like /etc/passwd.

methods.name: sort_passwd(sysconfdir)
methods.description: Sorts passwd and group files within a specified sysconfdir, cleaning up backups and ensuring proper ordering by ID.
